H0.text: Valence is the sum of protons and neutrons in the nucleus of an atom.

H1.text: Mass number is the sum of protons and neutrons in the nucleus of an atom.

H2.text: Chemical property is the sum of protons and neutrons in the nucleus of an atom.

H3.text: Electrical charge is the sum of protons and neutrons in the nucleus of an atom.

A4.text: The mass number [...] is the total number of protons and neutrons [...] in an atomic nucleus.
